title: Emerald Brilliance Diamond Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: 26.05 carats of vibrant emeralds (12 stones). Crafted with meticulous precision and set in a secure prong setting for enhanced brilliance and durability.
features: This exquisite haaram showcases a graduated design with strategically placed emeralds interspersed amongst clusters of brilliant-cut diamonds. The emeralds are square cut, providing a geometric counterpoint to the organic arrangement of the diamond clusters, creating a mesmerizing play of light and color. Modern interpretation of a classic South Indian necklace.
colors: and deep green emeralds. A captivating tricolor combination representing prosperity and growth.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (pendli)
and milestone celebrations. Also suitable for elegant evening events and modern soirees where you desire a touch of traditional grandeur.
description: A harmonious blend of traditional aesthetics and contemporary design, this emerald and diamond haaram is a statement of timeless elegance. The carefully selected emeralds exude a rich, vibrant color, while the brilliant diamonds add unparalleled sparkle. Meticulously crafted for exceptional comfort and durability, this piece is an investment that will be treasured for generations.
